duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all editorial content for Digital Dealer and RFID Journal brands, including freelance budget.
Collaborate with event and marketing teams to develop editorial strategy and implement across multiple platforms.
Lead the publication of digital magazines and manage online blogs.
Serve as a player-coach, writing content, managing, editing, and publishing work submitted by freelance writers.
Collaborate with other teams to manage awards initiatives, attend brand tradeshows, and facilitate webinars.
Facilitate webinars and serve as the face of sponsored product videos.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Journalism, Communications, or related field (Master's preferred)
